title: About
text:

MA Literature: Comparative Literature. (2007) University of Nebraska at Kearney

title: Omar Ghamedi
text:
Research:

Calabria, Southern Italy: studying landscape response to subduction. Evaluating river profiles for records of landscape uplift and deformation along subduction interface.
